original_text: And the officers shall speak unto the people, saying, What man is there that hath built a new house, and hath not dedicated it? let him go and return to his house, lest he die in the battle, and another man dedicate it.
korean_text: 책임자들은 백성에게 말하여 이르기를 새 집을 건축하고 낙성식을 행하지 못한 자가 있느냐 그는 집으로 돌아갈지니 전사하면 타인이 낙성식을 행할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: And the officers shall speak unto the people
saying, What man is there that hath built a new house
sentences.korean_translation: 이르기를 새 집을 짓고 난 사람이 누구냐

sentences.original_text: let him go and return to his house
lest he die in the battle
